The painful practice with slow insight [: Someone is ordinarily full of acute greed, hate, and delusion
They often feel the pain and sadness that greed, hate, and delusion bring
These five faculties manifest in them weakly: faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom
They only slowly attain the conditions for ending the defilements in the present life
The painful practice with swift insight: Someone is ordinarily full of acute greed, hate, and delusion
They often feel the pain and sadness that greed, hate, and delusion bring
These five faculties manifest in them strongly: faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom
They swiftly attain the conditions for ending the defilements in the present life
The pleasant practice with slow insight: Someone is not ordinarily full of acute greed, hate, and delusion
They rarely feel the pain and sadness that greed, hate, and delusion bring
These five faculties manifest in them weakly: faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom
They only slowly attain the conditions for ending the defilements in the present life
The pleasant practice with swift insight: Someone is not ordinarily full of acute greed, hate, and delusion
They rarely feel the pain and sadness that greed, hate, and delusion bring
These five faculties manifest in them strongly: faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom
They swiftly attain the conditions for ending the defilements in the present life
